- - - 90 Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Presslee, Happy Friday! I sent you a LinkedIn message so wanted to follow up. I understand Stage Stores is a consumer-facing company, with a large e-commerce platform, handling payment transactions for thousands of customers each day. As I am sure you know a few milliseconds of delay in page load time can be disastrous: - The average shopper is 40% more likely to leave your site for a competitor if your page takes longer to load than 2 seconds - One study found that a 1-second delay in webpage response time can impact overall sales conversions by 7%
It is along these lines that I would like to introduce you to Turbonomic. B2C organizations like Rue La La, Expedia and Wayfair leverage Turbonomic to ensure that high-priority, business-critical applications, including online shopping carts, e-payment, search functionality and supply chain management, are perpetually given access to the resources they need to perform at the highest level. Turbonomic has in fact been proven to not only assure performance for mission-critical applications, but also improve it by upwards of 37%. I’ve included a whitepaper that might be of particular interest to you and your team: Empowering E-Commerce against Unpredictable Demand <[[http://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic_Empowering-Ecommerce-Against-Unpredictable-Demand.pdf]]> If you would be open to the conversation, I would welcome the opportunity to connect with you or another team member to discuss the information above and introduce you to Turbonomic. Are you available for an hour over the next couple weeks?Best, Alex Opiela
